channel.title: Porn on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Porn on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Confessions of a Recovering AI Porn Addict
item.description: A “gooner” tells WIRED he became hooked on the cartoonish nature of AI porn. Several addictions experts say the genre could pose a problem for people prone to compulsive sexual behavior.

item.title: Confessions of a Recovering AI Porn Addict
item.description: A “gooner” tells WIRED he became hooked on the cartoonish nature of AI porn. Several addictions experts say the genre could pose a problem for people prone to compulsive sexual behavior.

item.title: Meta pirated and seeded porn for years to train AI, lawsuit says
item.description: Lawsuit: Meta may have seeded porn to minors while hiding piracy for AI training.

item.title: The Age-Checked Internet Has Arrived
item.description: Starting today, UK adults will have to prove their age to access porn online. Experts warn that a global wave of age-check laws threatens to chill speech and ultimately harm children and adults alike.

item.title: The Age-Checked Internet Has Arrived
item.description: Starting today, UK adults will have to prove their age to access porn online. Experts warn that a global wave of age-check laws threatens to chill speech and ultimately harm children and adults alike.

item.title: Steam and Itch.io Are Pulling ‘Porn’ Games. Critics Say It's a Slippery Slope to More Censorship
item.description: A conservative group is targeting payment processors as “a weapon” to get adult games deindexed in storefronts. Even games that have nothing to do with sex or abuse have been caught in the dragnet.

item.title: Steam and Itch.io Are Pulling ‘Porn’ Games. Critics Say It's a Slippery Slope to More Censorship
item.description: A conservative group is targeting payment processors as “a weapon” to get adult games deindexed in storefronts. Even games that have nothing to do with sex or abuse have been caught in the dragnet.

item.title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
item.description: For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex. She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.
